headline: Interpublic Receives Global ISO Certifications for Information Security, Privacy, and Cloud Management
summary: Company-wide Recognition Underscores Commitment to Protecting Client Data and Powering Secure, Data-Driven Marketing Solutions Across All OperationsNew York, NY, Oct. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) today announced it has achieved three of the top certifications for information security and privacy across the global enterprise: ISO/IEC 27001:2022 (Information Security), ISO/IEC 27701:2019 (Privacy Information Management), and ISO/IEC 27017:2015 (Cloud Security). These

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Interpublic Group (IPG) Winning Bayer’s Global Marketing Account
summary: In recent days, Bayer’s Consumer Health division announced the selection of Interpublic Group of Companies as its exclusive global creative, production, and media agency partner, consolidating marketing responsibilities for renowned self-care brands such as Aspirin and Claritin. This move signals Bayer’s intention to modernize its marketing approach at scale, leveraging advanced GenAI technologies and integrated global-local capabilities to deepen consumer trust across regions. We’ll examine...

headline: Here's Why Interpublic Group (IPG) is a Strong Momentum Stock
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

headline: 3 Stocks Under $50 We Think Twice About
summary: Stocks in the $10-50 range offer a sweet spot between affordability and stability as they’re typically more established than penny stocks. But their headline prices don’t guarantee quality, and investors should exercise caution as some have shaky business models.
